title: How to Merge a Console Fortnite Account to Epic Games

steps.title: No, you can't merge two PC Fortnite accounts together.
steps.content: No, you can't merge two PC Fortnite accounts together. Currently, there's no way to connect two separate Epic Games accounts . You can only connect a console account (XBox, PlayStation, or Nintendo Switch) to your Epic Games account. [1] X Research source While this feature was available in the past, it's unlikely that Epic Games will bring it back. Additionally, you can't transfer V-Bucks from one account to another. Once the funds are added to an account, it will stay linked to that account.

steps.title: Go to https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/?lang=en-US in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/?lang=en-US in a web browser. If you play Fortnite on a console and on a computer, you can merge the two accounts together. You must already have an Epic Games account. If you don't have one, you'll need to create one first.

steps.title: Click Sign-in.
steps.content: Click Sign-in . This is in the top-right corner. This may also look like a person icon.

steps.title: Enter your Epic Games login information.
steps.content: Enter your Epic Games login information. Make sure to use the correct email and password.

steps.title: Click Apps and Accounts.
steps.content: Click Apps and Accounts . This is in the left panel of the Account Settings page. If you don't see this page, click â˜° in the top-right corner. Click your profile icon, and then select Account .

steps.title: Click Connect next to your console.
steps.content: Click Connect next to your console. You may need to scroll down to find it. If you're connecting a LEGO account, select Connect next to LEGO Account .

steps.title: Click Connect Account.
steps.content: Click Connect Account . You should see a pop-up with your Epic Games account email. Make sure the email address is correct.

steps.title: Sign into your console account.
steps.content: Sign into your console account. You'll need to use your PlayStation , Microsoft , or Nintendo account to log in.

steps.title: Click Continue.
steps.content: Click Continue . This will connect your console account to your Epic Games account. Once connected, your account progress will be merged including skins and other cosmetics.
